Package org.hibernate.search.backend.lucene.search.sort.dsl

Interface LuceneSearchSortFactory

All Superinterfaces:
ExtendedSearchSortFactory<LuceneSearchSortFactory,LuceneSearchPredicateFactory>, SearchSortFactory
public interface LuceneSearchSortFactory extends ExtendedSearchSortFactory<LuceneSearchSortFactory,LuceneSearchPredicateFactory>
A factory for search sorts with some Lucene-specific methods.
